Presentation
==============

Installed :
Ubuntu Mate 16.04
ROS Kinetic
git
Arduino + Makeblock librairies (open port access + choose Mega 2560 board)
ros-kinetic-rosserial-arduino
ros-kinetic-rosserial
ros-kinetic-usb-cam
ros-kinetic-web-video-server
gedit

python :
on cv environnment :

pip-19.2.3
virtualenvwrapper
py3cv4 environment with numpy, open-cv 3.1.1
